name: df-psr
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6, setvar s7, setvar s8, setvar s9
body: |- wceq(cmps, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, csb(s3, crab(s2, co(cn0, cmap, cv(s0)), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s2)), cn), cfn)), csb(s4, co(cfv(cbs, cv(s1)), cmap, cv(s3)), cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cv(s4)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cres(cof(cfv(cplusg, cv(s1))), cxp(cv(s4), cv(s4)))), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmpo(s5, s6, cv(s4), cv(s4), cmpt(s7, cv(s3), co(cv(s1), cgsu, cmpt(s8, crab(s9, cv(s3), wbr(cv(s9), cofr(cle), cv(s7))), co(cfv(cv(s5), cv(s8)), cfv(cmulr, cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s6), co(cv(s7), cof(cmin), cv(s8)))))))))), ctp(cop(cfv(csca, cnx), cv(s1)), cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), cmpo(s8, s5, cfv(cbs, cv(s1)), cv(s4), co(cxp(cv(s3), csn(cv(s8))), cof(cfv(cmulr, cv(s1))), cv(s5)))), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cpt, cxp(cv(s3), csn(cfv(ctopn, cv(s1))))))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ mPwSer =(s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶[{ s2 ‚àà(‚Ñï0[‚Ü¶]s0)|(`' s2 " ‚Ñï)‚àà Fin } / s3][((Base ` s1)[‚Ü¶]s3)/ s4]({ <(Base ` ndx), s4 >, <(+ ` ndx),(oF((+ ` s1))|`(s4 √ó s4))>, <(√ó ` ndx),(s5 ‚àà s4, s6 ‚àà s4 ‚Ü¶(s7 ‚àà s3 ‚Ü¶(s1[gsum](s8 ‚àà { s9 ‚àà s3 | s9[oR(‚â§)]s7 } ‚Ü¶((s5 ` s8)[(√ó ` s1)](s6 `(s7[oF(-)]s8)))))))> } ‚ãÉ { <(Scalar ` ndx), s1 >, <(√ó ` ndx),(s8 ‚àà(Base ` s1), s5 ‚àà s4 ‚Ü¶((s3 √ó { s8 })[oF((√ó ` s1))]s5))>, <(TopSet ` ndx),(Xt_ `(s3 √ó {(TopOpen ` s1)}))> }))
comment: Define the algebra of power series over the index set ` i ` and with coefficients from the ring ` r ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)
